short_summary: Benchtop Fluorescence Microscope with LED Light Source, stand and camera needed for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency.
description: The Charlottetown Laboratory requires one new Benchtop Fluorescence Microscope with LED Light Source, Stand and Camera .
full_summary:
# Benchtop Fluorescence Microscope with LED Light Source, Stand and Camera

## Tender Announcement

### Title 
Benchtop Fluorescence Microscope with LED Light Source, Stand and Camera

### Solicitation Number
2024-00098

### Reference Number
cb-7447-1799477

### Amendment Number
1

### Tender Notice

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites bids for the procurement of one new benchtop fluorescence microscope with LED light source, stand, and camera for its Charlottetown laboratory.

The following specifications are required:

* Benchtop fluorescence microscope
* LED light source
* Stand
* Camera

### Procurement Information

* **Buyer Contact Information**
	+ Name: Franky To
	+ Email: [franky.to@insurance.gc.ca](mailto:franky.to@insurance.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (343) 548-9389
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive bidding
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Tender Documents
All tender documents, including the notice of proposed procurement, can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7447/2024-00098-notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7447/2024-00098-notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp.pdf).

### Closing Date
August 8, 2023, at 14:00:00

### Expected Contract Start Date
September 1, 2023

### Expected Contract End Date
March 29, 2024

### Regions of Opportunity
Canada

### Regions of Delivery
Charlottetown

This notice has been posted to inform bidders of the tender announcement and to provide necessary information for the procurement process. If you are interested in bidding on this project, please review the tender documents carefully and follow the instructions outlined in the notice of proposed procurement.
